statements: SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel;
SELECT personnel_id, name, department FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel;
SELECT name, department FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel ORDER BY last_training_date DESC;
SELECT personnel_id, name, department, last_training_date FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE last_training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE department = 'Fire Department';
SELECT personnel_id, name, certification_status FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY personnel_id DESC;
SELECT name, department, last_training_date FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE last_training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE department = 'Medical Department' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_personnel FROM EmergencyResponsePersonnel WHERE certification_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT personnel_id, training_name FROM training_records ORDER BY personnel_id DESC;
SELECT id, training_name FROM training_records WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM certification_records WHERE personnel_id = 1005 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT training_name, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE personnel_id = 101 ORDER BY completion_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certification_records WHERE personnel_id = 202 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT training_name, completion_date, personnel_id FROM training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT personnel_id FROM training_records
SELECT personnel_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM certification_records GROUP BY personnel_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_personnel;
SELECT personnel_id, name, role FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT name, training_date, training_type FROM emergency_response_personnel JOIN training_records ON emergency_response_personnel.personnel_id = training_records.personnel_id;
SELECT personnel_id, certification_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_personnel;
SELECT name, role FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT personnel_id, name, role FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE role = 'Paramedic';
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT erp.personnel_id, erp.name, tr.training_date, tr.training_type FROM emergency_response_personnel erp JOIN training_records tr ON erp.personnel_id = tr.personnel_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_personnel;
SELECT personnel_id, name FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT personnel_id, training_type, completion_date FROM training_records ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT personnel_id, name, certification_type FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT personnel_id, compliance_status, last_check_date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = false ORDER BY last_check_date;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY personnel_id DESC;
SELECT name, certification_status FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT personnel_id, certification_type, expiration_date FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM emergency_response_personnel WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT personnel_id, compliance_status, last_check_date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY last_check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_personnel;
SELECT name, age FROM emergency_personnel ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM certification_records WHERE certification_name = 'CPR';
SELECT personnel_id, training_date, duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE training_type = 'Fire Safety' ORDER BY duration_hours ASC;
SELECT personnel_id, compliance_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE personnel_id = 101 AND compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM emergency_personnel;
SELECT personnel_id, name, age FROM emergency_personnel WHERE age > 30;

SELECT e.name, c.certification_name, cr.compliance_status FROM emergency_personnel e INNER JOIN certification_records c ON e.personnel_id = c.personnel_id LEFT JOIN compliance_records cr ON e.personnel_id = cr.personnel_id;
SELECT tr.training_type, tr.duration_hours, er.name, er.age FROM training_records tr INNER JOIN emergency_personnel er ON tr.personnel_id = er.personnel_id;

SELECT ec.check_date, ec.equipment_check, er.name, cr.compliance_status FROM readiness_checks ec INNER JOIN emergency_personnel er ON ec.personnel_id = er.personnel_id LEFT JOIN compliance_records cr ON ec.personnel_id = cr.personnel_id;
